publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-794 Shona Robison: Grove Academy Debating Success-That the Parliament congratulates Grove Academy pupils Kenny Nicoll and Netan Dogra for winning the Scottish heats of the Oxford Union Schools Competition; pays tribute to the hard work of their teachers in developing their debating skills, and wishes Grove Academy success when representing Scotland at the Oxford finals during the summer.

S2M-794 Shona Robison: Grove Academy Debating Success-That the Parliament congratulates Grove Academy pupils Kenny Nicoll and Netan Dogra for winning the Scottish heats of the Oxford Union Schools Competition; pays tribute to the hard work of their teachers in developing their debating skills, and wishes Grove Academy success when representing Scotland at the Oxford finals during the summer.
S2M-794 Grove Academy Debating Success (lodged on 15 January 2004) Michael Matheson*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-794 Grove Academy Debating Success (lodged on 15 January 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-794 Grove Academy Debating Success (lodged on 15 January 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Sandra White*
